CustomField.description: This is an Invoice Number which is automatically created by Salesforce and delivered to Quickbooks via Workato, our Middleware. It's important for bookkeeping purposes as the Invoice Numbers in Salesforce must be identical to the Invoice Numbers in Quickbooks
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is an Invoice Number which is automatically created by Salesforce and delivered to Quickbooks via Workato, our Middleware. It's important for bookkeeping purposes as the Invoice Numbers in Salesforce must be identical to the Invoice Numbers in Quickbooks
CustomField.label: Invoice Number
